name: magicpack
description: Magicpack is a simple tool for managing image or asset packs through a minimal web interface. It helps developers and designers group and organize graphic resources with easy upload and search.
features: Asset organization: Group images and graphics into collections for project-based management.
Bulk upload: Upload multiple files simultaneously to speed up asset library creation.
Tag system: Apply custom tags to assets for quick filtering and categorization.
Search interface: Find specific assets using filename, tag, or metadata search.
Preview generation: Automatically create thumbnails for quick visual identification of assets.
Download management: Export individual files or entire collections as compressed archives.
Access control: Set permissions to control who can view, upload, or modify asset packs.
Metadata editing: Add descriptions, keywords, and custom fields to assets for better organization.
Version tracking: Keep multiple versions of assets with revision history and rollback capability.
API access: Integrate asset management into external tools and workflows via REST API.
